name: Save those Space Stations!
description:
The engineers broke the shields of three space stations. Normally that is no big deal but there is a huge cloud of asteroids heading towards these defenseless stations.

Someone has to deflect these asteroids to defend those stations and the people living on them.

Credits:

Most Assets were found on opengameart.org under CC0 license except the Space Station Design by MillionthVector http://millionthvector.blogspot.de

Thanks to Unlucky Studios for the Spaceship assets ( http://opengameart.org/content/complete-spaceship-... ) and Kenney.nl for most Sound Effects ( http://opengameart.org/content/63-digital-sound-ef...)
